name: Rustled Pete (itch)
description:
Rustled Pete is a very unforgiving boss fighting platformer. There is only one boss in the game and his name is Pete The Rustled. He has 4 forms, each one is harder than the other. Good luck!

Gameplay

  • You only have one life, but I'm sure you will manage!
  • Accumulate your combo counter and time your attacks to deal devastating blows to Pete!
  • Unlock new Pete Forms, and test your skills as he becomes angrier and angrier in each form!
